body: Hi I face another Problem about angle to north. Thanks for helping MSM [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KzOvBNTGFEEOdsjIiT5bjxnHTgwx6PeMzyC64AzWWj8ifip0DSKOnDuxMuzLTFICNW6yEIDnSTffYFsae7kHmQGMt7-pAthj/12.jpg)

replies.body:
Hi Masoome,

first take the surfaces (walls) and conect the to glazing ratio componet and than make a zone from it

regards

Thanks Peter. This is very interesting! I would have never found this bug, as I would have never used the components in this order. Masoome, Peter is true that this is not the common workflow but it should have worked for you anyways. It was a bug and I fixed it. You can update your files with github or follow peter's suggestion. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KzOvBNTGFEH*udDcixhEuFgdLlaLFST8vuZ4zcFDP-Q4dM2X4obKp90nW3CXqkQjIjI9l0O-fPuxWq6rdptUSvVaXk4qgRj4/addGlazing_alternate.png) Also it is always good to upload your file with your question. It will be much easier to help. Let us know if you have any other questions, Mostapha
